thread.section_title: Extreme Sports Channel: The Home of Action Sports
thread.title: Neighborhood Parks with Tom Wallisch

title: Neighborhood Parks with Tom Wallisch
text: Submit Neighborhood Parks with Tom Wallisch Follow iconic freeskier Tom Wallisch as he showcases his terrain park talent from the resorts of his youth to the city he now calls home. show more Originally hailing from Pittsburgh, PA, Tom's neighborhood haunts consisted of Seven Springs, PA and Wisp Resort, MD, eventually heading west to Park City, UT. In Neighborhood Parks, watch as Tom dismantles all three resorts in a span of three-and-a-half minutes. show less Please log in to post a comment.
